title: Print Hello World
description: Write a C# program that prints 'Hello World'.

title: Add Two Numbers
description: Given two numbers, print their sum.
solution: int a = 3; int b = 5; Console.WriteLine(a + b);

title: String Length
description: Print the length of a string using Length property.

title: Check Even or Odd
description: Given a number, print "Even" if it is even, otherwise "Odd".

title: Loop Through Array
description: Print each number of an array.
solution: int[] arr = {1,2,3}; foreach (var x in arr) Console.WriteLine(x);

title: Reverse a String
description: Reverse a string using char array reverse.
hints: Convert to char array, then reverse.

title: Greeting Function
description: Create a method greet(name) that prints Hello name.

title: Access Dictionary Value
description: Given a dictionary user with key "name", print the value.

title: Check If String Contains Substring
description: Check if a string contains another substring using Contains().

title: Convert String To Int
description: Convert string to integer using int.Parse().
